name: Project Dragon
description:
This Project is still in early development. The current available build is a very early indev version strictly provided for play-testing purposes. It does not reflect the final product.

*This project is currently using Synty assets as placeholders for development purposes. Although I plan on using some of these assets in the final game as generic level decoration, the ultimate goal is to use my own art for most characters, weapons and set-pieces.

Want to help support the development of my games while also receiving a behind the scenes look at upcoming work? Visit my Patreon and find out more: https://www.patreon.com/SirisPendrake

Or you can send a one-time donation via ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/siristhedragon

Or you can follow me by checking out:

My Discord Server: https://discord.gg/xY7eXy

My YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtTkRWKbkl06fIRNlItQLJQ?view_as=subscriber

My Art Station: https://www.artstation.com/siristhedragon

My Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/siristhedragon/?hl=en
